long_description: Designed for pool swimming, the Garmin Swim watch logs your distance, pace, stroke count and stroke type and features free wireless online analysis, storage and sharing of your data. ANT+ wireless uploads your data to Garmin Connect for accurate analysis, secure storage and easy sharing. Gauge your swimming efficiency with the time and number of strokes required to swim a pool length. Advanced features allow you to create timed sets and log drills. Watch features 12- and 24-hr. time, dual time zones, day/date and a daily alarm. User-replaceable CR 2032 coin-cell battery offers up to 12 months of power. The Garmin Swim watch is water-resistant to 50m (165 ft.) and operates in temperatures ranging from 14degF (-10degC) to 122degF (50degC).
short_description: Designed for pool swimming, the Garmin Swim watch logs your distance, pace, stroke count and stroke type and features free wireless online analysis, storage and sharing of your data.
